alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 9:35PM EDT until April 09 at 5:55AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek At Burtonsville. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water reaches Priddle Camp Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:01 PM EDT Friday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:01 PM EDT Friday was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 2.9 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Burtonsville Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Fri 9 pm: 6.6 Forecast: Sat 2 am 5.6 Sat 8 am 4.7 Sat 2 pm 4.3 Sat 8 pm 4.0 Sun 2 am 3.9 Sun 8 am 3.8 Sun 2 pm 3.6 Sun 8 pm 3.4 Mon 2 am 3.2 Mon 8 am 3.1 Mon 2 pm 2.9 &&
